sentences.en: Did Patton need a backup plan at Gettysburg?
sentences.cn: 巴顿在葛底斯堡之战里有备用方案 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do not use a bit-image method of backup (like a tape streamer), because this will copy the virus.
sentences.cn: 不要使用位元影像的方法（如磁带机）备份，因为这样会将病毒一起拷贝下来。

sentences.en: Every part of the system has a backup.
sentences.cn: 系统的每个部分都有备用元件。

sentences.en: File in the target drived :  BACKUP directory will be erased strike any key when ready.
sentences.cn: 目标驱动器标 d: \BACKUP目录 内的文件将被删除,准备好后按任意键继续.

sentences.en: Have you got a backup plan?
Have you kept a backup of this file?
sentences.cn: 你把这文件备份了 吗 ?
他的备用降落伞也坏了.

sentences.en: Our troops cut the enemy's backup supplies from behind their back.
sentences.cn: 我军从后方斩断了敌人的后勤供给线.

sentences.en: Restores to standard disk storage format files previously stored using the BACKUP command.
sentences.cn: 把先前用BACKUP命令做的备份文件恢复到这个磁盘上.

sentences.en: She once sang backup for Madonna.
Small rectangular backup bars were used to fabricate the web - bottom flange connection.
sentences.cn: 在腹板与下翼缘的施焊中使用小矩形挡板.

sentences.en: The hospital has a backup generator in case there is a power failure.
sentences.cn: 医院有备用发电机以防停电.

sentences.en: The police had backup from the army.
sentences.cn: 警方得到了军方的增援。

sentences.en: The young state secretary found simple procedures for handling the backup of trains.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻的国务秘书用简单的方法排除了车辆回流的问题.

sentences.en: There is no emergency back-up immediately available.
sentences.cn: 没有立即就能获得的后备。

sentences.en: Two backup singers that want to be lead vocalists, solo stars?
sentences.cn: 两位和声歌手渴望成为主唱成为独唱明星?

sentences.en: We can use him as a backup if one of the other players drops out.
sentences.cn: 如果有参赛者退出，我们可以用他作为替补。

sentences.en: When the main system fails, the backup system take over.
sentences.cn: 当主系统不能工作时, 后备系统立即投入工作代替之.

trans.tran_en: Backup consists of extra equipment, resources, or people that you can get help or support from if necessary
